TestCase.name: Medline_ConO_001
TestCase.description: Check display the Confirmation Overlay for sending to Email

step.description: 1. Prerequisite: 1. Medline Results Summary page is opened Select some individual checkboxes on Results Summary
step.substep: Clicking Link 'Selected database link'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Button 'Clear Field'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Button 'Select years dropDown'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Button 'Select all years from dropdown'. Expected result: True.
Enter search field - search field = Title, search term = From the Local to the Global

step.description: 2. Click on Email icon at the top or at the bottom of page
step.substep: Clicking Button ''Export' button'. Expected result: True.

step.description: 3. Enter valid email address in "Email To" field and hit on "Send Email" button
step.actual: Unexpected runtime error : Tried to run command without establishing a connection
step.substep: Text: 'newthomsontesting@gmail.com' was sent to the 'To' textbox (XPath(".//input[@id='emailAddress']")), textbox content after sending is 'newthomsontesting@gmail.com'

Dropdown: 'Full Record ' options were requested to be selected in 'Drop down 'Record content'' dropdown (XPath(".//span[contains(text(),'Email Records')]/../..//select[@id='bib_fields']")), selected option in dropdown after selection is 'Full Record '

Dropdown: 'Full Record' option was requested to be selected in 'Drop down 'Record content'' dropdown (XPath(".//span[contains(text(),'Email Records')]/../..//select[@id='bib_fields']")), selected option in dropdown after selection is 'Full Record '
Clicking Button 'Send Email'. Expected result: True.
Text of Text 'Title' contains all requested texts.
